column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The waitress was so nice that when she scooped a slice of the Â pizza to put on my plate before I could take a picture (for yelp
column2: you know) I couldn't help but forgave her!!! She even dropped a portion of the cheese on the table and apologized for it---Ugh
column3: because the pizza was great and the wings were excellent I can overlooked this mishap though I could have easily handed my 5 stars
